302.talk_content: You should increase your team's power before entering the Source Layer.

304.talk_content: First of all, try to raise Verthandi's combat level.

305.talk_content: Battle Records are ready. Tap Level Up to quickly absorb combat knowledge.

308.talk_content: In addition, we can also enhance the performance of our Modifiers by raising their skill levels.

309.talk_content: Go back to the main screen.

407.talk_content: We have someone new with us today. Add Zenkibo to your squad.

503.talk_content: Uh-oh, a tougher enemy has turned up. But don't worry—so has Poseidon!

504.talk_content: Add the newly arrived Poseidon to your combat team.

506.talk_content: Poseidon will give your team the strength it needs! Now it's the time to take the enemy head-on.

602.talk_content: The squad's ready. Continue with your mission!

802.talk_content: Admin, the Access Key system is up and running. Check it out.

804.talk_content: When a Modifier awakens, Gaea grants them a certain level of access via an Access Key. An Access Key is both a Modifier's weapon and their source of power.

805.talk_content: And just like Modifiers, Access Keys can also be enhanced.

806.talk_content: Sephirah Crystals, found deep in the Source Layer, can be refined and then absorbed by Access Keys.

807.talk_content: You picked up a good number of Sephirah Crystals during this operation. Try enhancing Runic Blade, Verthandi's Access Key.

809.talk_content: Besides absorbing Sephirah Crystals, there are other ways to make your Access Keys more powerful. Tap to go back to the Access Key screen.

810.talk_content: Each Access Key can have a Functor attached, boosting the degree of control the Modifier has over it.

811.talk_content: But be careful—the Gen-zone of the Functor and the Modifier holding the Access Key must match.

812.talk_content: Once a Functor is attached to an Access Key it adds an ATK bonus, as well as extra powers.

813.talk_content: Once a Functor is attached to an Access Key it adds an ATK bonus, as well as extra powers.

814.talk_content: Select this Functor and attach it to Runic Blade.

815.talk_content: Select this Functor and attach it to Runic Blade.

816.talk_content: Access Key is now attached. Carry on with your mission.

1002.talk_content: Rookie, the Past Grudges facility has been debugged. Go take a look.

1003.talk_content: The Past Grudges facility constantly pushes you and your team to the limit. Hold out in the virtual battlespace as long as you can for the best results.

1005.talk_content: For more details, take a look at this instruction manual.

1102.talk_content: Rookie, the adjustments to the Hazard Zone Cleaning system are complete. Check it out.

1104.talk_content: To more rigorously assess Mods in battle, the system will simulate the World Line's fluctuations.

1105.talk_content: For more details, you can refer to this instruction manual.

1202.talk_content: Rookie, we've collected enough Shifted Stars in earlier missions. Now we need to convert those into valuable computing power. We'll fill you in on the specifics when you come to the Cryptics.

1302.talk_content: Rookie, access to the Recurring Dream has been granted. Take a look.

1303.talk_content: This equipment uses the Dream system to recreate powerful enemies Modifiers have faced in the past.

1304.talk_content: Tap to select the opponent you wish to challenge.

1305.talk_content: For more details, take a look at this instruction manual.

1601.talk_content: Tap here to see all owned Functors.

1704.talk_content: Select your preferred Modifier for the Directed Extended Scan now.

1802.talk_content: Rookie, access to the Aether Code system is now open. Time to choose an appropriate combat style for your Modifiers.

1804.talk_content: Aether Codes are part of the powers granted to Modifiers by Gaea, and correspond to how they use their Divine Power.

1805.talk_content: Adjustments to Aether Codes can grant Modifiers various battle capabilities.

1806.talk_content: Code Imprinting can boost Modifiers' skills and their effects.

1807.talk_content: Each Modifier can be imprinted with up to 3 Aether Codes. Aether Codes can be removed and replaced.

1808.talk_content: Aether Codes can be imprinted as soon as they are unlocked. You can choose the ones you believe best suit your Modifier.

1902.talk_content: Rookie, M.E.O.W's Combat Role is ready for action. Check it out.

1904.talk_content: M.E.O.W's computational powers can take on some of the command workload during combat.

1905.talk_content: Each M.E.O.W. has its own strengths. Once activated, they will produce specific effects.

1906.talk_content: When certain conditions are met, you will be able to use the corresponding M.E.O.W. in combat.

1907.talk_content: The Control Chip can help the Admin make better and smarter tactical decisions using M.E.O.Ws.

1908.talk_content: M.E.O.W Chips come in different types, each with a specific effect.

1909.talk_content: Mix and match different chips to get the exact tactical effect you want with your M.E.O.W.

1910.talk_content: Similarly, when certain conditions are met, you will be able to unlock the corresponding Control Chips.

1911.talk_content: Unlock the Control Chips and install M.E.O.W. with the selected ones.

1917.talk_content: Add a M.E.O.W to your squad to help with in-battle command.

1919.talk_content: Equip a suitable Control Chip to make better and smarter tactical decisions using M.E.O.Ws.

1920.talk_content: Equip the selected chip to your M.E.O.W now.

1922.talk_content: M.E.O.W deployed. You may now continue with your tactical plan.

2002.talk_content: Rookie, odd phenomena can still appear in cleared zones.

2003.talk_content: Carrying out a Battle Sweep can turn up rare Sigils.

2004.talk_content: Admin can choose a Sigil set as an UP, and the stage drops will be one part of that set.

2005.talk_content: For more details, take a look at this instruction manual.

2102.talk_content: Rookie, the intel for the new mission has been updated. You may check it here.

2103.talk_content: You may switch mission types here.

2201.talk_content: Rookie, CORG seems to have a mission for you. Go take a look.

2202.talk_content: Joint Training missions with CORG are now available. According to their intel, there's a chance of finding rare Sigil Modules.

2203.talk_content: For more details, take a look at this instruction manual.

2401.talk_content: Welcome to the restaurant. Now let's see how to view the dishes and the stored ingredients. Tap the recipe to view the unlocked dishes.

2402.talk_content: On the left side you can see the different cookware for the dishes. It's recommended to add different types of dishes to the menu for sale.

2403.talk_content: Here you can see the list of dishes that can be cooked with each type of cookware. Some dishes can only be cooked when the restaurant reaches a certain level.

2404.talk_content: After selecting a dish, you can view its detailed information.

2405.talk_content: Here you can see the estimated earnings and the flavor of the dish.

2406.talk_content: The ingredients for the dish will be shown here.

2407.talk_content: Go to the Warehouse to view the ingredients and their quantities currently in stock.

2408.talk_content: The information and quantities of the ingredients will be displayed here, and you can get more ingredients by completing jobs.

2501.talk_content: Admin, the ingredients are ready. Tap the menu and put the dishes on sale.

2502.talk_content: Here are the unlocked dishes. Tap to sell them, and they will be sold automatically 24/7. The maximum number of dishes to be sold will increase as the restaurant level increases.

2503.talk_content: Here are the ingredients for the dishes. If they are insufficient, the dishes will be sold out and stop earning for the restaurant.

2504.talk_content: You need to add dishes to the menu and keep the restaurant running. Let's start with one first.

2505.talk_content: The ingredients for the second dish are also ready. Tap it and start to sell it.

2506.talk_content: Once the dishes are on the menu, the preparation of the restaurant is complete. All you need to do is wait for the customers to come and bring you earnings.

2601.talk_content: Now that the dishes have been put on the menu, you'd better not just wait for the ingredients to run out. Replenish your stock by completing jobs.

2602.talk_content: These are the job requests you receive, and by completing them, you can get the ingredients sent to you by the client. Brand new jobs may appear when you level up your restaurant.

2603.talk_content: Once you learn the information about the job, you can prepare to dispatch. After you complete one job, another will be sent to you immediately.

2604.talk_content: Completing jobs costs Stamina. You can see the Mods' stamina here. If they have no stamina or have already been dispatched, you will not be able to dispatch them.

2605.talk_content: For those who have not been dispatched, their stamina will be restored over time. So remember to plan your Modifiers' routine wisely!

2606.talk_content: Here you can see the total amount of stamina required for this job, and the sum of the selected Modifiers' stamina needs to be no less than this amount in order to be dispatched.

2607.talk_content: Different types of Mods are recommended for different jobs, and the Great Success rate can be increased by dispatching the corresponding Mods.

2608.talk_content: Real-time probability of Great Success completion of the current job. If the job is completed with a Great Success rating, you will get extra rewards.

2701.talk_content: Hang out and spend some time with Skuld. "Trip Diary" is now available.

2702.talk_content: Skuld is resting in her room.

2703.talk_content: Where should we go today? Organize a trip for Skuld.

2704.talk_content: Select the destination for the trip.

2705.talk_content: Select the items to be carried for this trip. Different items brought to the same place will trigger different incidents.

2801.talk_content: The trip is over and we are back.

2802.talk_content: Trips will bring Skuld more knowledge.

2804.talk_content: Let's take a look at the incidents that happened during the trip.

2805.talk_content: The trip incidents have been recorded here by Skuld. You can check them any time.

2806.talk_content: Skuld will record her thoughts here after coming back from several trips.

2807.talk_content: Skuld is not good at expressing herself, so these contents can only be unlocked after her knowledge meets certain requirements and a specific trip incident is recorded.

2809.talk_content: Don't forget to claim the trip rewards!

2901.talk_content: The photos obtained during the trip seem to have changed.

2902.talk_content: The photos are all stored here... Why is there an extra one?

3401.talk_content: Rookie, after the initial studies, the supply acquisition permission has been unlocked for you.

3502.talk_content: The Cryptics have achieved a major breakthrough in their Sigil research. Let's go take a look.

3503.talk_content: Report indicates that a few springs deep within the Source Layer have transparent associated crystals, the extracts of which can be used to carry out LimitBreak of Access Keys and Sigils.

3504.talk_content: For more details, you can refer to this instruction manual.

3601.talk_content: Rookie, you've made the acquaintance of a capable companion. Come and familiarize yourself with the basic combat controls with this Modifier!

3604.talk_content: The Basic Tutorials allow you to learn some of the most useful combat knowledge.

3605.talk_content: The Character Tutorials allow you to know more about the Modifiers fighting alongside you, and maximize their combat efficiency.

3701.talk_content: Hey. Don't be alarmed, it's me, the Lord. I'm here to tell you an important news: You can enhance the Sigils by Enchanting them.

3702.talk_content: Once a Sigil reaches the required level, a fixed Enchant effect will be unlocked directly.

3703.talk_content: At the same time, a new Enchant slot will be unlocked. You can use Sigil Modules to perform an Active Enchant to obtain additional Enchant effects.

3704.talk_content: I've shared all the information that I know with you. If you want to know more about Sigil Enchant, tap to open the instruction manual here.

3802.talk_content: I've just received a message from The Cryptics that they've found materials for Sigil enhancement in the relics in the depths of the Source Layer.

3803.talk_content: However, there are many Visbanes in the way. Defeat them and get more Revelations!

3902.talk_content: Rookie, the Cryptics turned a high-quality Sigil Core into a standalone module used to increase the Relaying Ring's Divine Grace response efficiency. They've called it "Warp."

3903.talk_content: When a Sigil equipped in a location reaches Lv. 40, materials can be spent to unlock that location's corresponding Warp Core.

4002.talk_content: Rookie, access to the Warp system has been granted. Let's go take a look.

4003.talk_content: The Cryptics turned a high-quality Sigil Core into a standalone module used to increase the Relaying Ring's Divine Grace response efficiency. They've called it "Warp."

4004.talk_content: When a Sigil equipped in a location reaches Lv. 40, materials can be spent to unlock that location's corresponding Warp Core.

4006.talk_content: When activated, the Warp Cores can enhance multiple abilities of the Modifier exclusively.

4007.talk_content: Every Warp Core can have up to two of its abilities boosted. But don't worry, you can make changes to boosts here anytime if you need to.

4008.talk_content: The exclusive boost effect of Warp Cores can greatly enhance the Modifier's strength.

4009.talk_content: Warp Factors are required when equipping and upgrading Warp Skills.

4010.talk_content: You can view the number of Warp Factors you have and the limit you can hold here.

4011.talk_content: Don't forget to obtain Warp Factors before equipping Warp Skills.

4012.talk_content: You can increase the amount of Warp Factor by consuming Function materials, which can be obtained from Hazard Zone Cleaning Difficulty Ω.

4101.talk_content: By fusing the Divine Power of normal 5-Star Sigils, you can boost up the abilities of the Modifier.

4102.talk_content: Gen-Zone Reconstruction can reconstruct a normal 5-Star Sigil into a random Gen-Zone Sigil, providing additional stat bonuses for Mods of the corresponding Gen-zone.

4103.talk_content: Clarifying Reconstruction can reconstruct a Gen-Zone Sigil into an Exclusive Sigil, providing more stat bonuses to the corresponding Modifier.

4104.talk_content: I am here to tell you this important news as soon as I can. If you want to know more about the Reconstruction of Sigils, tap to open the instruction manual here.

4204.talk_content: Like a black hole, the hole created by the explosion can't be controlled, and it's showing signs of collapse. For this reason, it's been named "Perilous Chasm." Perilous Chasm consists of multiple levels. When all areas in one level are cleared, the next level is unlocked.

4205.talk_content: Each area is rated differently depending on its difficulty, and areas rated Ω can be challenged repeatedly to accumulate your clearing progress.

4207.talk_content: Information about the current area is displayed here, and you can tap the avatar of the target area to view the detailed information.

4208.talk_content: If you want to know more about the Perilous Chasm, please refer to the instruction manual here.

4301.talk_content: After the final debugging by The Cryptics, the Modifier & Access Key Synergy device is now officially activated.

4303.talk_content: Stirring up deep memories and emotions can significantly increase the effect of Synergy. This place is for items provided by Modifiers that have a high impact on themselves.

4305.talk_content: Here you can view the enhancements that can be gained by Synergy.

4306.talk_content: To unlock this Modifier's Synergy, you will have to complete the corresponding missions.

4307.talk_content: Certain requirements also need to be fulfilled to activate the Synergy.

4308.talk_content: If you want to know more about Synergy, tap here to view the manual.

4401.talk_content: Complete the Newcomer Sign-In to start to get to know the other Modifiers and obtain tons of Scan Vouchers.

4402.talk_content: Tap here to collect today's reward!

4404.talk_content: Don't forget to come back for more rewards tomorrow, too!

4405.talk_content: The Novice Course will help you familiarize with your job.

4406.talk_content: Complete all course missions to Transcend the Modifier Tidal Song - Poseidon to Ω.

4407.talk_content: New course missions will unlock each day.

4408.talk_content: Collect various level rewards when you reach the corresponding levels.

4409.talk_content: Reach Lv. 60 to Transcend New Pact - Verthandi to SSS, as well as obtain the 5-Star Yggdrasill Functor: Elf - Galadriel.

4410.talk_content: Of course, as a new member, you can also obtain generous rewards in daily jobs.

4411.talk_content: After completing the jobs of the day, new jobs will be unlocked at 05:00 the next day.

4412.talk_content: After completing all of the jobs, you can Transcend Surefire - Zenkibo Tengu to SSS, and obtain the exclusive outfit: School Days.

4501.talk_content: I believe you are now very familiar with your basic duties, Admin. So let's get to the study program now!

4602.talk_content: We have received the latest news from Ookuninushi, the test run of the Arithmetic Terminal is complete, and the Dimensional Variable simulation has been activated.

4604.talk_content: The Arithmetic Terminal is a simulation device developed under the leadership of Ookuninushi for the purpose of calculating the rate of change of Gaea, but currently it is only used as a training ground for tactical decision-making.

4605.talk_content: During Dimensional Variable challenges, you can use Dimensional Beacons as assistance.

4606.talk_content: Dimensional Beacons require sufficient data to be unlocked and activated, and can be used to facilitate the later exploration.

4607.talk_content: Unlock a Dimensional Beacon and see what happens.

4609.talk_content: The Dimensional Terminal records the steps of your exploration, and the accumulated experience will make it smoother.

4610.talk_content: By leveling up the Dimensional Terminal, you can gain Talent Points to activate Perks, which will give you boosts in the exploration.

4611.talk_content: In order to explore the dimensional space more effectively, the Perks selected in Dimensional Terminal can be reset once a week.

4613.talk_content: Tap here to map the Modifier that follows you as you explore the dimensional space.

4615.talk_content: Mappers are required to map a specific Modifier in dimensional space.

4616.talk_content: Mappers are automatically generated on every Thursday at 5:00, and you can have at most 1 Mapper at a time.

4618.talk_content: Deviation Record can be obtained through Dimension Curve. Dimension Curve is reset at regular intervals, and the missions will change over time, too.

4619.talk_content: You can receive rewards for affecting the scope of Deviation and getting more information.

4620.talk_content: Fortune Permits obtained in Deviation can be exchanged for items in Shop.

4621.talk_content: If you want to know more about Dimensional Variable, tap to open the instruction manual here.

4622.talk_content: Tap to see details about the game mode.

4623.talk_content: Tap to see details about the game mode.

4624.talk_content: Tap to see details about the game mode.

4702.talk_content: Admin, there seems to be a new development in The Cryptics's Dormitory development program.

4801.talk_content: Take a look at the Dorm area of the Aether Gazer building. This is a space where Modifiers can get some R&R.

4803.talk_content: Many rooms are still locked now. You can unlock them with the Dorm Fund earned by running the restaurant.

4804.talk_content: Some rooms are available already. Modifiers whose Affinity reaches Lv. 5 can move in directly.

4805.talk_content: When a Modifier moves in, you can send them furniture as gifts to decorate the room, and the room will be linked to the Modifier.

4806.talk_content: Drag or tap the switch button to switch the view to another area.

4807.talk_content: If you want to view the room layout of other Admins, try the visit function.

4809.talk_content: The lobby is unoccupied now. Tap to enter and have a look!

4902.talk_content: Tap the edit button to rearrange the current scene. Some furniture is only displayable after being sent as a gift.

4903.talk_content: By switching types you can view the furniture currently owned, and some of the furniture is ready now.

4904.talk_content: Hmm... it looks like the doors and windows in the lobby still need to be installed by yourself. You can drag them and place them in the scene.

5001.talk_content: When all the changes have been made, you can tap Settings to set the current room as a display room, where other Admins can visit.

5003.talk_content: Tap the Navigate button to switch to other scenes.

5004.talk_content: Tap it to view Modifiers who can currently rest in the lobby.

5005.talk_content: The current Modifiers' information will be displayed here.

5006.talk_content: After selecting a Modifier, drag them to place them in the lobby. If you want to call them back, simply tap on them again.

5101.talk_content: The recovery speed of the current Modifier's stamina is fixed in the lobby. It speeds up in the room as the room level rises.

5102.talk_content: Inviting Modifiers to dinner can increase the Modifier's stamina. Note that there is a daily limit on the number of times the same Modifier can eat.

5103.talk_content: When a Modifier has their own room, you can send furniture to them. Furniture sent can be placed in the lobby or in their room.

5104.talk_content: Try to pat the Modifier and you may see an unexpected side of them.

5105.talk_content: You can also gain a small amount of Park Stamps by interacting with the Mods in mini-games.

5201.talk_content: The restaurant in Flaneuring is also available, and you can earn rewards by running it.

5202.talk_content: The restaurant in Flaneuring is also available, and you can earn rewards by running it.

5203.talk_content: To run the restaurant well, you'll need to assign the Modifiers to the right posts. Tap to assign.

5204.talk_content: There are different posts in the restaurant. Now you're checking the Chef post.

5205.talk_content: Tap to select a Modifier. Their skill bonus will be shown on the avatar.

5206.talk_content: The Modifier's stamina and level information can be viewed here.

5207.talk_content: Modifier skill details are displayed here, and skills need a certain level of the Modifier to be unlocked.

5208.talk_content: If everything is checked and ready to go, you can assign the Modifier selected to their post. All the posts need to be assigned with Mods before the restaurant opens.

5301.talk_content: Admin, the ingredients are ready. Tap the menu and put the dishes on sale.

5302.talk_content: Here are the unlocked dishes. Tap to sell them, and they will be sold automatically 24/7.

5303.talk_content: Here are the ingredients required for the dishes. The maximum quantity of dishes to be made will be limited by the quantity of the ingredients.

5304.talk_content: You can set how many dishes you want to sell, but if you want to change the number, you need to remove the dish from the menu first.

5305.talk_content: Depending on the quantity you set, the estimated time and earnings of the order will be displayed here.

5401.talk_content: Ingredients needed for the dishes can be obtained by completing jobs.

5402.talk_content: These are the job requests you receive, and by completing them, you can get the ingredients sent to you by the client. New jobs may appear when you level up your cookware.

5403.talk_content: Once you learn the information about the job, you can prepare to dispatch. After you complete one job, another will be sent to you immediately.

5404.talk_content: Here you can see the information about the Modifier, and the corresponding type label will light up when the Modifier fits the job.

5405.talk_content: Mods need to spend stamina for each job, and the sum of the selected Modifiers' stamina needs to be no less than this amount in order to be dispatched.

5406.talk_content: Dispatching the right Mods increases the chance of a Great Success rate. The best Mods for the job will have their titles highlighted.

5407.talk_content: Real-time probability of Great Success completion of the current job. If the job is completed with a Great Success rating, you will get extra rewards.

5408.talk_content: You can quickly select the most suitable Modifiers to dispatch for the current job.

5501.talk_content: You can level up the facilities in the restaurant by keep the place running.

5502.talk_content: Leveling up the facilities unlocks new dishes and increases the earnings of the corresponding dishes, as well as increasing the restaurant's Popularity.

5503.talk_content: Buff of the facilities will be shown here, and the value will increase when the level of the facility rises.

5504.talk_content: The facilities can only be upgraded when certain requirements of restaurant operation are met.

5505.talk_content: After meeting the upgrade requirements, you need to spend certain materials to upgrade.

5603.talk_content: Hey Admin! The Cryptics have just come up with a new data collection system. Let's go take a look! But first, you'll need to select the area you'd like to explore. Let's begin with Ain Soph!

5604.talk_content: You can set the duration here. The longer your exploration, the more rewards you will earn.

5605.talk_content: Here, you can select the M.E.O.W. you wish to deploy. Each has its specific skills and attributes that make it better suited to some areas compared to others.

5606.talk_content: Once you're done with your selections, tap here to start.

5608.talk_content: For more details, take a look at this instruction manual.

5701.talk_content: Admin, some unknown Visbanes have broken into the Surface Layer in the Jokurr Sephirah Zone. CORG have sent a message for assistance—we need to move now!

5702.talk_content: First, let's learn more about the situation on the field. Tap here to get prepared.

5703.talk_content: In Merits, you can view other players' Jokurr Rescue progress.

5704.talk_content: Contributions in Jokurr Rescue will be displayed by level.

5705.talk_content: Complete a mission to gain Attack Merits of the corresponding Sequence.

5706.talk_content: Increase your Sequence Level to unlock Field Boosts and share the effect with teammates.

5707.talk_content: Increasing the Sequence Level will also grant you Data Modules, which can be used to greatly boost Mods' performance in battle.

5708.talk_content: Once you reach a certain Sequence Level, you will gain an official certificate and extra operational rewards for your efforts in the rescue!

5901.talk_content: The Pavilion of Flavors is on the verge of bankruptcy due to mismanagement, so I've bought up half of it to help out the owner, who's an old friend of mine.

5902.talk_content: Preparations for the New Year's Awakening are underway on Banchuan River Street, and I've decided to completely renovate the Pavilion of Flavors and reopen it for the holiday!

5903.talk_content: Established over one hundred years ago, almost everyone has fond memories of the Pavilion of Flavors.

5904.talk_content: However, recently it has lost its way and the customers have stayed away. Now it has a new owner, a soft launch is even more pivotal before it officially reopens to the public.

5905.talk_content: Let me give you a tour before we officially open for business.

5906.talk_content: This is the place I just bought, which will serve as the main business premises.

5907.talk_content: Can you see those cells marked on the map? Let me tell you what each one of them does.

5908.talk_content: This is food, which is an essential resource to keep the business running.

5909.talk_content: Each round costs a certain amount of food. If we run out of food, the business will fail.

5910.talk_content: These are customers. Hosting them in the restaurant will provide Popularity.

5911.talk_content: Popularity can be spent to use Specialty Abilities, which have powerful effects. So it's important to gain Popularity.

5912.talk_content: This one is a Building. Once you have enough buildings, you can expand the Operation Scale.

5913.talk_content: Doing this will unlock better Specialty Abilities and Talents, and make it easier to hit our targets.

5914.talk_content: This section will display how much you have of each resource. If you ever forget what one of the resources does, you can tap the icon to check it again.

5915.talk_content: Oh of course, you need to know how to actually get these resources, don't you?

5916.talk_content: It's very simple. If you connect three or more cells of the same type and same level, they will automatically merge into one of a higher level, and you'll gain resources equal to the number of cells × the cells' level.

5917.talk_content: Why does that get you resources? I'm not too sure to be honest with you, but I'm not going to complain if it helps me earn money. Why don't you try and merge some cells now?

5918.talk_content: Try holding down on a cell and dragging it to a neighboring space.

5919.talk_content: Try holding down on a cell and dragging it to a neighboring space.

5920.talk_content: You did it! Not only did that get you 3 Food, the cell is now 1 level higher than it was before.

5921.talk_content: It's worth remembering that a cell's level can never exceed the current limit.

5922.talk_content: Tap here to see what the current cell level limit is and the greatest distance cells can be moved.

5923.talk_content: Now let's try and merge some Buildings.

5924.talk_content: Now let's try and merge some Buildings.

5925.talk_content: Now you've got enough buildings, the Operation Scale has expanded and you've unlocked a new ability.

5926.talk_content: Tap on an empty space to close the pop-up window.

5927.talk_content: Tap here to see what skills are currently unlocked for this character.

5928.talk_content: We'll finish the tutorial first before getting to the more advanced stuff.

5929.talk_content: Now let's try and get some Popularity.

5930.talk_content: Now let's try and get some Popularity.

5931.talk_content: Uh-oh, looks like we've got a Nasty Customer on our hands.

5932.talk_content: Not only do Nasty Customers not give us any benefits, but they occupy other spaces.

5933.talk_content: If they think they can come and cause trouble at my restaurant, they've got another thing coming!

5934.talk_content: Use the Popularity we've just gained to cast my Specialty Ability and kick the Nasty Customer out. Doing so will also get us extra Food.

5935.talk_content: Drag the skill over to the space you want to use it in.

5936.talk_content: Ah, there's been a Disaster here. Disasters are another type of negative cell.

5937.talk_content: Unlike Nasty Customers, if you don't do anything about them, Disasters will disappear on their own once the timer has counted down.

5938.talk_content: But I would still rather use a Specialty Ability to make it count down faster, plus this will gain you extra Buildings.

5939.talk_content: Drag the skill over to the space you want to use it in.

5940.talk_content: Each time a cell is moved, the business operation time will be increased by one round. Reach a certain number of rounds to enter the next stage, which will be tougher than the one before.

5941.talk_content: Here you can see the business goal. Meet it to win!

5942.talk_content: Okay, I think I've taught you everything I know about running a business. Good luck!

6002.talk_content: There are other ways we can enhance a Modifier's capabilities. Let's go take a look.

6003.talk_content: There is still a lot of room to improve Verthandi's capabilities. Sigils can provide her with extra power.

6004.talk_content: You can check out the current Sigil allocation in the Relaying Ring.

6005.talk_content: You acquired a new Sigil in that last battle. Equip it to Verthandi now.

6006.talk_content: Every Sigil has its corresponding slot.

6007.talk_content: Place the Sigil in its slot.

6009.talk_content: Equip three Sigils with the same name for an extra bonus!

6010.talk_content: And as a carrier of human civilization, Sigils can be upgraded by pooling.

6012.talk_content: Revelation is a special type of Sigils, which provides more EXP when used for pooling.

6101.talk_content: Admin, a new game mode from Studio Mimir, Idol Competition, is being piloted right now!

6102.talk_content: Admin, a new game mode from Studio Mimir, Idol Competition, is being piloted right now!

6201.talk_content: Welcome to the Idol Competition! Tap to enhance your Modifier's stats.

6202.talk_content: This is where you can improve your Modifier's capabilities. The labels tell you whether the Modifier is an offensive or defensive character.

6203.talk_content: You will only be able to improve the capabilities of Modifiers who are currently participating in Idol Competition here. But don't worry, more Modifiers will be added in the future!

6204.talk_content: Let's take a look by selecting a Modifier now.

6205.talk_content: The various stats of the Modifier are shown here.

6206.talk_content: Stats vary from Modifier to Modifier, so plan your enhancements accordingly.

6207.talk_content: Every Modifier also has their own personal style. Match your Modifier to the recommended style for the stage to get points more easily.

6208.talk_content: There is a limit to how many times you can improve your Modifiers' capabilities each day.

6209.talk_content: Each day, Modifiers of a randomly recommended Gen-zone will also get enhancement bonuses when their stats are raised.

6210.talk_content: You can select items corresponding to various stats for training, which will expend the Modifier's Swigs.

6211.talk_content: First, tap on the training for "Sense of Music."

6212.talk_content: The higher the Modifier's Swigs level is when they undergo training, the more likely they will receive additional stat bonuses.

6301.talk_content: Place the Modifier here to put them on rest so that they can recover.

6302.talk_content: Just like in the Lobby and the dorm room, you can drag the Modifier in here.

6303.talk_content: Here, they will recover at the same rate as they would in their dorm room. If they are not yet in their dorm room, they will recover at the same rate as they would in the Lobby.

6401.talk_content: Now, you are ready to duke it out with other players or friends taking part in Idol Competition.

6403.talk_content: This is the basic info of the stage, which tells you the recommended style or Modifier Gen-zone.

6404.talk_content: Before battling other players, you may view or switch at any time the corresponding battle and/or participating Modifiers.

6405.talk_content: Using a Modifier aligned with the recommended style/Gen-zone can help you win more easily. You can check compatibility by looking at the labels on the Modifier's avatar when you switch to another challenge and/or Modifier.

6407.talk_content: First, take a look at how other players and your friends have selected their Modifiers.

6409.talk_content: You may select your Modifier based on the stats of the current stage as well as the other party. You can also view more details about the other party's Modifier here.

6410.talk_content: Don't be discouraged if you don't win the challenge! Make some adjustments, and try again when you're ready.

6501.talk_content: You can complete missions each day through enhancing your Modifiers or taking part in battles.

6502.talk_content: Mission ratings also count towards overall progress, and you will earn the corresponding reward each time you advance to another progress stage.

6503.talk_content: Get the corresponding Modifier Intel when you complete Stages 1 to 3.

6504.talk_content: Tap to view your stage progress and rewards. Complete Stage 4 to get the Modifier Intel of your choice (from a selection of certain Modifiers you've already recruited).

6505.talk_content: Each time you complete Stage 4, the progress will reset to Stage 1 again. Keep completing stages for more rewards!

6602.talk_content: The Cryptics believe that this Loop Amplifier can effectively improve the efficiency of Divine Grace output. However, as they suspect that there may be some instability with this new device during battle, they have decided to conduct Iterative Testing to collect more data first.

6603.talk_content: Tap to go to Iterative Testing.

6604.talk_content: The test involves various battle scenarios featuring different stats.

6605.talk_content: Each stat can be tested at various difficulty levels, which are unlocked when you reach the corresponding levels.

6606.talk_content: You can look up the boss info of the current difficulty level here. Once you defeat the boss, the squad that was used will be locked in, and up to 6 Modifiers can be locked in for each battle.

6607.talk_content: If you wish to learn more about Iterative Testing, tap here to look at the instruction manual.

6701.talk_content: Welcome to Crisis Rehearsal! Before you enter the battlefield, let's take a look at the differences between the Crisis Rehearsal battlefield and regular battlefields.

6702.talk_content: You may complete the stages in the various chapters in any order. However, we do suggest that you complete the Prologue in order.

6703.talk_content: Tap here to start the first stage.

6801.talk_content: There will be several waves in each stage. To start the stage, you will first have to assign a different squad to each wave.

6802.talk_content: For the first wave, we suggest that you assign a regular Modifier squad. Tap here to assign the squad.

6803.talk_content: Each squad may only be assigned to one wave. Use the wave and squad information given to you to help you make your decisions.

6804.talk_content: Assignment complete for Wave #1. Tap here to assign a squad for Wave #2.

6805.talk_content: For the second wave, we suggest that you assign an Elite Modifier squad. Tap here to assign the squad.

6807.talk_content: Tactical skills are an extremely powerful category of extra-battlefield skills in Crisis Rehearsal that can turn the tide of battle instantly. They can be unlocked using funds. You can learn more in the Skills screen.

6808.talk_content: Characteristics and objectives vary from wave to wave, so choose your squads and skills accordingly.

6809.talk_content: If you wish to learn more about Crisis Rehearsal, tap here to look at the instruction manual.

6901.talk_content: Admin, the Cryptics have modded the Access Keys of certain Modifiers to give them access to a specially designed Aether Code system.

6902.talk_content: Aether Codes correspond to the way Modifiers use their Divine Power. Thanks to the Cryptics' hard work, this Aether Code system does not have any limits on imprint count. Go check out this new system.

6903.talk_content: The Aether Codes in the inner circle have a sequential relationship. You have to imprint the preceding Aether Code before you can imprint the following one.

6904.talk_content: The same applies for Aether Codes in the outer circle: you have to imprint the preceding Aether Code before you can imprint the following one.

6905.talk_content: Each Aether Code has a specific set of unlocking conditions, and unlocks automatically when these conditions are met. However, in the special Aether Code system, once an Aether Code is imprinted it will not be removed. Cool, isn't it?

7001.talk_content: Apart from playing against other players, you can also choose to play PvE stages instead.

7002.talk_content: Apart from playing against other players, you can also choose to play PvE stages instead. Tap to start a stage.

7003.talk_content: Stages can be attempted more than once. Complete a stage for the first time to unlock the next one.

7004.talk_content: The rewards you obtained are dependent on your performance in the stage.

7005.talk_content: Tap on Challenges to look up the related details.

7007.talk_content: This is the opponent you will be facing on the stage. Tap on their avatar to learn more about them.

7101.talk_content: The Cryptics have completed their testing and have determined that the Loop Amplifier may now be officially put into use.

7102.talk_content: In accordance with the SOPs, you have to first enter the Skills screen from here.

7103.talk_content: Select the skill you wish to enhance.

7105.talk_content: Skill stats may be enhanced provided that the requisite conditions have already been met.

7201.talk_content: The No Way Back event is now on. Players may customize their schedules for the day in Notes on the Admin's terminal.

7202.talk_content: Go to Notes in the Admin's terminal, then select the missions for the day.

7203.talk_content: The Training Schedule contains the available missions for the day. Players are to choose 4 of them. Do note that for Coordination Training and In Pursuit of Enjoyment, you must first select the corresponding missions to obtain challenge attempts.

7204.talk_content: You may also select the default Schedule if you wish.

7205.talk_content: Complete all missions in the Schedule and get additional Trending Molander Souvenirs.

7206.talk_content: Tap to confirm the Schedule for the day.

7207.talk_content: Tap on Slow Walks in the City to switch to the mode entry point list.

7208.talk_content: You may explore the various modes available for play in Slow Walks in the City.

7209.talk_content: Tap to return to Notes to complete Schedule missions.

7210.talk_content: If you wish to learn more about No Way Back, tap here to look at the instruction manual.

7302.talk_content: Here, you can try out lots of events, enjoy beautiful music, and take part in hair-raising competitions.

7303.talk_content: As we search the park, we'll need to <color=#E78300>get to Target Squares</color> to trigger different <color=#E78300>story events</color>. <color=#E78300>Tap the mission</color> to view the location of the current Target Square.

7304.talk_content: To trigger story events, you'll need to <color=#E78300>spend Duckie Coins</color>, so make sure to collect as many as possible while playing.

7305.talk_content: There are <color=#E78300>glowing markers</color> at target locations. Look, that's the first Target Square with a story event over there! <color=#E78300>Head toward it</color>!

7306.talk_content: Here, you can see your <color=#E78300>current number of Duckie Coins</color>. Without them, you <color=#E78300>can't unlock story events</color>, so make sure to <color=#E78300>collect more</color> on the way!

7307.talk_content: <color=#E78300>Roll dice</color> to earn <color=#E78300>steps</color> and move across the map. You can roll dice as many times as you want, so don't worry about running out of chances.

7401.talk_content: Not bad! You got an item. Using items at the right times will make it easier to reach the target.

7501.talk_content: This is the Target Square! Here you can <color=#E78300>spend Duckie Coins</color> to watch the story event. Go on, tap to <color=#E78300>confirm</color>!

7601.talk_content: The duck who stole our Duckie Coins is right up ahead. Let's use a remote-controlled die to take it down!

7603.talk_content: The duck is two squares ahead. Let's choose 2!

7701.talk_content: Welcome to the Stellaris archipelago! You'll be running a gift shop here. Meet customers' needs to obtain rewards.

7702.talk_content: Here, you can see the purchase type and purchase amount of the current wave of customers.

7703.talk_content: Tap customer avatars to view detailed information about them.

7704.talk_content: Here, you can see the customers' purchase plan, shopping requirements, and special features.

7705.talk_content: Some customers will also have special characteristics which will impact sales. Keep an eye on the characteristics of new customers in order to deal with them appropriately.

7706.talk_content: If you want to find out the special characteristics of each customer, you can find them in the Gallery.

7707.talk_content: Here, you can see the initial Sales Capacity calculated by the store's in-built smart system. This allows the Admin to see whether or not they meet the needs of the customers during each wave.

7708.talk_content: But the store's smart system isn't very advanced, so there'll be some discrepancies between the predicted numbers and the real thing. It's not 100% accurate, so our apologies to the Admin.

7709.talk_content: When the Sales Capacity meets the purchase needs of the customers, you can get ready to open for business!

7710.talk_content: Tap Start Business and wait for the next customer wave.

7711.talk_content: There are no shelves in this store! The customers won't be happy about this.

7712.talk_content: Tap Edit to place some shelves.

7713.talk_content: The current store doesn't have much available space. We can only place shelves in the available area, and customers can only walk in the available area, too.

7714.talk_content: As you do more business, your store's scope will increase. Complete the specified waves and the available space will grow as well.

7715.talk_content: You need enough Archipelago Coins to place your shelves. If you don't have enough, you won't be able to place them.

7716.talk_content: Here, you will find the current store's path length. Customers will travel along this path and purchase items along the way, so make sure the path passes by as many items as possible.

7717.talk_content: We've only unlocked one shelf so far. As you progress, you'll unlock more types. Try placing a shelf now!

7801.talk_content: You unlocked an item with a special effect! Open the Gallery to check it out.

7802.talk_content: Tap Products to switch to the product gallery.

7803.talk_content: Every item will increase the store's Sales Capacity by a specific amount. Some items also have special effects.

7804.talk_content: Let's see what we just unlocked!

7805.talk_content: Items with special effects will show up here. Meet the conditions to trigger them and add extra Sales Capacity to your shelves.

7806.talk_content: Choosing the right products for your shelves is an important part of running the shop.

7807.talk_content: But before you can use items, you will need to pay to unlock them. If you want to meet the needs of your customers, they're well worth the money. Try unlocking this product here.

7808.talk_content: As you can see, there are a lot of different products in the store. Keep doing business to unlock more product types.

7809.talk_content: If you accidentally unlock a product you don't need, tap here to reset.

7810.talk_content: After resetting, the Archipelago Coins you spent on unlocking products will be refunded, and the products will become locked again.

7901.talk_content: You obtained a lot of Archipelago Coins in the last shift. Use them to upgrade the shelves in the store.

7902.talk_content: Tap Shelves to switch to the shelf gallery.

7903.talk_content: Here, you can see detailed information about your shelves. You can see the current Sales Capacity of the shelves, as well as the Sales Capacity after upgrading.

7904.talk_content: Increase your Sales Capacity to better satisfy your customers. Shelves can be upgraded up to 3 levels. Let's try upgrading a shelf!

7905.talk_content: Shelves come in different types, just like products. Keep doing business to unlock bigger shelves.

7906.talk_content: After unlocking bigger shelves, you can reset the shelves that were upgraded previously if you so wish.

7907.talk_content: After resetting a shelf, the Archipelago Coins you spent on upgrades will be refunded, and the shelf will be reset to Lv. 1.

8001.talk_content: Congratulations, Admin! Thanks to your hard work, the store has become bigger. Now, you have more space for shelves.

8002.talk_content: Tap Edit to replan your shop's shelving layout!

8003.talk_content: When you place your shelves, don't worry about blocking already existing paths. Customers will automatically find the shortest path from the entrance to the exit and start moving along it.

8004.talk_content: Make use of this by placing shelves in the right locations so that customers follow a path that passes by as many as possible.

8005.talk_content: We've also unlocked new shelf types. Different types of shelves can sell different types of products.

8006.talk_content: Next, try placing more shelves yourself!

8101.talk_content: This wave of customers looks a bit different. Let's take a look.

8102.talk_content: This customer has a special characteristic. Special characteristics impact the Sales Capacity of the shelves in the store.

8103.talk_content: Customers' special characteristics can help business run more smoothly or make it more difficult, depending on how you use them.

8104.talk_content: How to use customers' special characteristics is an important consideration when running a business.

8105.talk_content: Next, let's take some time to follow customers with special characteristics. Proper use of customer characteristics will be a big help when completing a shift!

8201.talk_content: Welcome to Codename: Cuboid. Tap to go to the stage selection screen.

8202.talk_content: Tap the skill icon to view skill details for the current stage.

8204.talk_content: Tap to view detailed gameplay information for Codename: Cuboid.

8301.talk_content: Tap here to quickly switch between items owned on the sticker background page.

8302.talk_content: Tap here to see all available stickers.

8303.talk_content: Tap here to freely place and edit stickers that you already own.

8304.talk_content: Tap here to see details about the game mode.

8401.talk_content: Welcome to Greatest Idol Poll! Each round of the event will be held at the scheduled time. You can register at any time before the deadline. When the deadline arrives, players will be randomly placed together in competition groups of 8 until a winner is decided.

8402.talk_content: During the event, you can take part in event missions. Mission rewards will be issued every day, so don't forget to take part! Whether or not you register for the competition during the event, you can still train your Modifiers. Training Modifiers suited to the competition will increase your chances of victory.

8403.talk_content: Once you've read and understood the competition rules, you can begin registration. You can edit registration information as many times as you want before the deadline, and you can check the rules at any time if there's still something you're not clear about.

8501.talk_content: There are 3 stages in the competition, and just like in Idol Competition, each stage has a recommended style. Choose the right Modifiers to increase your chances of winning. You can still change your Modifier deployment strategy after registration.

8502.talk_content: Once you've chosen your Modifiers for all stages, you can begin registration. After registering, you can train your Modifiers again at any time, but training Modifiers after the deadline will not affect the competition.

9901.talk_content: The Cryptics have provided new technology to help with sigil enchantment. Take a look!

9903.talk_content: Use Targeted Enchantment to select the Enchantment Indicia you need.

10001.talk_content: Admin, we've received a request from CORG asking Aether Gazer to help track down a batch of military prosthetics that's been smuggled out of Shashvat. We need to go to different Sephirah Zones to investigate.

10002.talk_content: Every Sephirah Zone is different, meaning enemy units will have different weaknesses in battle depending on the environment. Check enemy weaknesses in the current Sephirah Zone here.

10003.talk_content: Dispatch the right Mods based on enemy weaknesses to make combat twice as easy!

10004.talk_content: Clear On the Trail stages to earn Countermeasure Research Points.

10005.talk_content: Points earned can be used in the Cargo Recovery stage for Countermeasure Research, increasing a stat or Gen-zone Modifier DMG.

10006.talk_content: In the Cargo Recovery stage, earn points and Investigation Progress based on your combat performance.

10007.talk_content: When Investigation Progress reaches the specified tiers, you will be able to claim Investigation Rewards.

10008.talk_content: However, take note that each Modifier can only be sent to fight in one stage. After the battle, the corresponding Modifier will be locked in the stage and will not be able to fight in other stages.

10009.talk_content: Use the Reset function to reset all stages in the current area. After this, no Modifiers in the area will be locked, but Clues that have been collected will be cleared as well.

10010.talk_content: But don't worry, your Investigation Progress will not be affected. After resetting, you can replan the division of Modifiers across the stages.

10011.talk_content: Clear Cargo Recovery to unlock investigation in High-danger Zones. Enemies in High-danger Zones are stronger, but also increase Investigation Progress faster. Choose the method of investigation that suits you best.

10201.talk_content: Admin, Flaneuring has been updated and more game mode content has been added.

10202.talk_content: The navigation panel has been upgraded. Now, the Flaneuring map is more directly visible.

10203.talk_content: The shortcut panel has been added. Use it to quickly assign Modifiers to Dorms.

10301.talk_content: Tap to see details about the game mode.

10401.talk_content: Tap to see details about the game mode.

12302.talk_content: Let's take a look by selecting a Modifier now.

12312.talk_content: Try holding down on a cell and dragging it to a neighboring space.

12313.talk_content: Try holding down on a cell and dragging it to a neighboring space.

12324.talk_content: Drag the skill over to the space you want to use it in.
